entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then clearing. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 27 March 2023
